wddx_packet_end

(PHP 4, PHP 5, PHP 7)

wddx_packet_end — Ends a WDDX packet with the specified ID

Warning

This function has been DEPRECATED as of PHP 7.4.0. Relying on this function is highly discouraged.

说明

wddx_packet_end ( resource $packet_id ) : string

Ends and returns the given WDDX packet.

参数

packet_id

A WDDX packet, returned by wddx_packet_start().

返回值

Returns the string containing the WDDX packet.
